title: Verify inline policy with dlp file profile with data classification label general/Public and sublabel
custom_steps:
Create a DLP file profile with MIP instance selected
Select data classification label as general/Public/Personal and sublabel
Create an inline policy with the above dlp profile 
Send traffic hitting this policy
custom_expected:
Verify policy gets hit
Verify skopeIT event is generated withe dlp event showing up the MIP vendor and label details
Verify no crash on proxy
